qrme
  • Reference

ll

this is the likelihood function for estimating the copula parameter

ll(params, y, t, x, copula = "gumbel", Fyx, Ftx, fyx, ftx, Upi, Umu, Usig,
  Vpi, Vmu, Vsig, ndraws = 100)

Arguments

params

a value of the parameters to calculate the log likelihood for
y

should be a vector of outcomes
t

should be a vector of treatments
x

a matrix of values of x
copula

the type of copula, should be supported by cop.pdf
Fyx

function that contains the cdf of y conditional on x
Ftx

function that contains the cdf of t conditional on x
fyx

function that contains the pdf of y conditional on x
ftx

function that contains the pdf of t conditional on x
Upi

vector of probabilities for measurement error mixture model for Y
Umu

vector of means for measurement error mixture model for Y
Usig

vector of std. deviations for measurement error mixture model for Y
Vpi

vector of probabilities for measurement error mixture model for T
Vmu

vector of means for measurement error mixture model for T
Vsig

vector of std. deviations for measurement error mixture model for T
ndraws

the number of draws of U and V to make

Value

scalar negative value of log likelihood function

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
